alert.note: Alert for Hand (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 9:57AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hand County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1057 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ree Heights, or 10 miles northwest of Miller, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ree Heights around 1100 AM CDT. Miller around 1110 AM CDT. St. Lawrence around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sunshine Bible Academy and Vayland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
